...........!!! [Did you just say "Little dragon" in Arborian? Do you know the Archdorogon's grandson?] [My father was in the service of the former Archdorogon, he was a high priest. I used to see them often, and their disappearance made me really sad. I am what they call a sybil, a kind of doctor if you will. When I meet people on my travels who are in trouble, I help them.]

[Well then, he needs help. I know who was responsible. Morg is one of Dorogon Grizorg's most powerful soldiers, he uses poison extracted from an extremely venomous plant which can only be found here.] [Unfortunately, only the Archdorogon has the cure which can heal him.] [Your only chance is to find a way into the former Archdorogon's laboratory, he used to make potions there which could cure pretty much anything. I also practice the art, but I don't have his talent.]
d.a: Where can I find this laboratory?
d.phase: [There is a holy mountain at the opposite end of the island called Mount Everwest where the old Archdorogon used to brave the cold to test his latest formulae.] [He used to say that the temperature had very useful conservation properties.] [Unfortunately, I've never had the opportunity to go, so I could't say for sure...]
You set off, wondering who could possibly tell you which path to take to get there?
